content: Can we add mCODE STU2 IG Publication Request to next meeting's agenda?
Hi @Mark Kramer - this looks like an STU extension request, which only needs notification to FMG rather than approval. Let me know if I've read it correctly. If so, I can add to TSC vote.
@Anne Wizauer no, this is a publication request for a second STU version of an IG currently in STU version 1. Not an extension request.
Oh sorry! Iâ€™ve added to the agenda but will update it to reflect the correct type of request. My end-of-day eyes saw the end date for the current STU and I confused things. Thanks for clarifying!
@Anne Wizauer If there is going to be an FMG call on the 24th, I would like to reserve a place on the agenda for mCODE publication request (again). It should be a short item (5-10 minutes).
There may be an issue with numbers - Lloyd and Brian are away - are any other FMG members not going to be present? Or, put the other way, who will be present?
